text:
Fuyang | Shanghai, China | INTERNS, ONSITE

We are a small consulting company helping startups and small businesses apply a lean startup process to develop amazing digital products.

We are looking for mobile, React and React native, and Node.js devs. We are friendly to generalists and look for results, not credentials.

You must be based in Shanghai. Send CV directly to fuyang-recruit@inimino.org and mention HN in the subject line.
